abstract: McDonald's announces five-year plan to add more than 1,000 restaurants in China and 250 outlets in Hong Kong and South Korea.
lead_paragraph: McDonald’s said it planned to add more than 1,000 restaurants in China over the next five years.

headline.main: McDonald’s Plans to Add New Restaurants in Asia
headline.print_headline: McDonald’s Plans to AddNew Restaurants in Asia

snippet: McDonald’s said it planned to add more than 1,000 restaurants in China over the next five years.
